## (Non-R) Computing Resources

#### Git 

 - [Pro Git](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2) by Scott Chacon and Ben Straub
 - [Happy Git and GitHub for the UserR](https://happygitwithr.com/) by Jenny Bryan
 - [Git in Practice](https://www.manning.com/books/git-in-practice) by Mike McQuaid

#### Vim 

 - [OpenVim](https://www.openvim.com/) by Henrik Huttunen
 - [Mastering the Vim Language](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wlR5gYd6um0) recorded presentation by Chris Toomey
 - [Vim as Your Editor](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X6AR2RMB5tE&list=PLm323Lc7iSW_wuxqmKx_xxNtJC_hJbQ7R) a 6-part playist by ThePrimeagen
 - [NeoVim Setup Guide](https://www.josean.com/posts/how-to-setup-neovim-2024) by Josean Martinez

#### Quarto

 - [Quarto Docs](https://quarto.org/)
 - [Quarto Cheatsheet](https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/html/quarto.html)
 - [Quarto Extensions](https://m.canouil.dev/quarto-extensions/)
 - Quarto website examples: [Twitter List](https://x.com/NeuroKaiii/status/1644854726498963456) [Linkedin List](https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7197152805483102208/)

#### Command Line / DevOps

 - [Data Science at the Command Line](https://jeroenjanssens.com/dsatcl/) by Jeroen Janssens
 - [The Unix Workbench](https://seankross.com/the-unix-workbench/) by Sean Kross
 - [Dev Ops for Data Science](https://do4ds.com) by Alex Gold
 - [Stat447: Data Science Programming Methods](https://stat447.com/) by Dirk Eddelbuettel 

#### Python

 - [Python 4 Data Science](https://aeturrell.github.io/python4DS/welcome.html#) by Arthur Turrell and others
